description: Returns information about a stream, including the current status of the stream, its Amazon Resource Name (ARN), the composition of its shards, and its corresponding DynamoDB table. Each shard in the stream has a SequenceNumberRange associated with it. If the SequenceNumberRange has a StartingSequenceNumber but no EndingSequenceNumber, then the shard is still open (able to receive more stream records). If both StartingSequenceNumber and EndingSequenceNumber are present, then that shard is closed and can no longer receive more data.

parameters.name: StreamArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the stream.

nested_items.name: StreamDescription
nested_items.description: A complete description of the stream, including its creation date and time, the DynamoDB table associated with the stream, the shard IDs within the stream, and the beginning and ending sequence numbers of stream records within the shards.

nested_items.name: StreamArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the stream.

nested_items.name: StreamLabel
nested_items.description: A timestamp, in ISO 8601 format, for this stream.
the Amazon Web Services customer ID.
the table name.
the StreamLabel.

nested_items.name: StreamStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates the current status of the stream:
ENABLING - Streams is currently being enabled on the DynamoDB table.
ENABLED - the stream is enabled.
DISABLING - Streams is currently being disabled on the DynamoDB table.
DISABLED - the stream is disabled.

nested_items.name: StreamViewType
nested_items.description: Indicates the format of the records within this stream:
KEYS_ONLY - only the key attributes of items that were modified in the DynamoDB table.
NEW_IMAGE - entire items from the table, as they appeared after they were modified.
OLD_IMAGE - entire items from the table, as they appeared before they were modified.
NEW_AND_OLD_IMAGES - both the new and the old images of the items from the table.

nested_items.name: CreationRequestDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the request to create this stream was issued.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The DynamoDB table with which the stream is associated.

nested_items.name: KeySchema
nested_items.description: The key attribute(s) of the stream's DynamoDB table.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The name of a key attribute.

nested_items.name: KeyType
nested_items.description: The role that this key attribute will assume:
HASH - partition key.
RANGE - sort key.

nested_items.name: Shards
nested_items.description: The shards that comprise the stream.

nested_items.name: ShardId
nested_items.description: The system-generated identifier for this shard.

nested_items.name: SequenceNumberRange
nested_items.description: The range of possible sequence numbers for the shard.

nested_items.name: StartingSequenceNumber
nested_items.description: The first sequence number for the stream records contained within a shard. String contains numeric characters only.

nested_items.name: EndingSequenceNumber
nested_items.description: The last sequence number for the stream records contained within a shard. String contains numeric characters only.

nested_items.name: ParentShardId
nested_items.description: The shard ID of the current shard's parent.

nested_items.name: LastEvaluatedShardId
nested_items.description: The shard ID of the item where the operation stopped, inclusive of the previous result set. Use this value to start a new operation, excluding this value in the new request.
